DOC.brief_summary: The aim research examine social , psychological Islamic veil practicing ( IVP ) , non-complete IVP Inconsiderate IVP correlate body mass index ( BMI ) status woman population . It hypothesize woman IVP would differ depression , social variable compare non-practicing peer .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Body Dissatisfaction Among Islamic Veil Practicing ( IVP ) , Non-Complete IVP , Inconsiderate IVP Women
DOC.detailed_description: In cross-sectional study , population-based sample 1774 female respond anonymously aerobic health club administer questionnaire . Body mass index calculate height weight categorize four class underweight , normal , overweight , obese . The questionnaire also include question social experience , body dissatisfaction Body Shape Questionnaire ( BSQ ) , future goal Islamic Veil Practicing ( IVP ) . Persian version Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI-II Persian ) Rosenberg Self Esteem Scale also distribute among six group woman IVP/regular exercise ( RE ) , IVP/non-RE , Non-complete IVP/RE , Non-complete IVP/non-RE , Inconsiderate IVP/RE , Inconsiderate IVP/non-RE . Correlations BMI social , psychological , future goal IVP explore
DOC.criteria: Open woman practice Islamic veil , Noncomplete IV , Inconsiderate IV Overt sign Anorexia Nervosa , Bulimia Nervosa
